pinyin: Lǔ fó ěr gōng shì è luó sī zuì zhù míng de gōng diàn zhī yīn,

en: We met at the Lufthansa Palace and then went to visit the Forbidden City.
pinyin: Lǔ fó ěr gōng,

en: zhè wǎn zī yú tóu tāng kě yǐ zhè me hǎo hē! - Who would have thought that this bowl of zī yú fish head soup could be so delicious!
pinyin: 这碗鲻鱼头汤可以这么好喝! shéi huì xiǎng dào
